edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util
Class OMTDiscreteLodNode

java.lang.Object
  DiscreteLodNode
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.util.OMTDiscreteLodNode

public class OMTDiscreteLodNode
extends DiscreteLodNode

Provides a node that has convenience methods for setting the distance switch model at the same time that a child is being added. Also allows you to get at the currently active geometries easily.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu)
